title: Standard Emergency Radio Communication Format
brief: Use standardized radio format to quickly convey critical rescue information to pilots.
steps: Step 1: Say 'Mayday, Mayday' to indicate emergency.
Step 2: Give your call sign if you have one.
Step 4: Provide your location as precisely as possible.
Step 6: Describe available landing sites in area.
Step 7: Add any remarks about medical aid or specific immediate help needed.
warnings: Don't assume rescue is guaranteed just because you made contact.
Continue survival techniques until actually rescued.
